TopicTitle: Is Destruction Effects Continued still working for 1.11.2?

Articles.Content:
I'm currently playing with BDArmory installed and I really miss having a spectacular fireworks show whenever I shoot a plane down.

I tried installing the current version of Destruction Effects Continued but it doesn't seem to work. Did I miss something or is there a master that works with the current KSP version?
I can’t say for absolute certain for 1.11.2, but I’m using Destruction Effects V1.12 in 1.11.1 and it works fine.

46 minutes ago, a_space_oddity said:

I can’t say for absolute certain for 1.11.2, but I’m using Destruction Effects V1.12 in 1.11.1 and it works fine. 

I figured it out, I had an outdated version that for some reason prevented the most recent version from working properly.
